title: Intelligent Metrological Verification Strategy under the Guidance of Internet of Things Technology
abstract: It is intended to improve residents' awareness of energy saving and emission reduction, and promote the behavioral energy saving fundamentally, so as to achieve the goal of conducting energy saving. In this work, automation control technology, Internet of Things (IoT) technology, artificial intelligence and big data analysis technology are combined and applied to the improvement and optimization of heating metering. It is attempted to build an intelligent metering management platform under the IoT. The entire heating system is optimized by optimizing the energy-saving plan and implementation approach. As a result, an intelligent metering management system based on the IoT is successfully built. The system can analyze the heating habits of users and other related key information as the heating data of users are monitored and understood in real time. Finally, the targeted regulation can be conducted to achieve the flexible heating.
